creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two panels; small panel geometric cross stitch in diamond configuration with cross stitch borders; green, fuscha, gold on green border; large panel red, purple, green, pink geometric embroidery on borders of black, orange, green and pink with red; calico and blue edge; blue background
title: Baby Carrier
